justification: Rationale is A-centric and generic, with no clear modeling of B’s upside/rookie preferences or willingness to move a young ascending RB. It asks B to trade away Darian Campbell (fits B’s profile) for a veteran pocket QB (misaligned with B’s stated QB preference). It also mislabels TE as an upgrade: Liam Adams (Tier 4, declining) is a downgrade from A’s Tier 3 TE. Trade is feasible but internally inconsistent with profiles and poorly justified.
